ModMetaData.name: Drag and Drop Work Tab
ModMetaData.author: Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
<color=red>Requires HugsLib. Incompatible with other Work Tab mods.</color>
Replaces the Work tab with an overhauled version incorporating a drag and drop interface.
Includes a Compare Skills window to easily sort colonists by skill for a specific work type.
There are tooltips for nearly everything in the new interface: drag tips, stats, disabilities etc.
Includes an options menu - <color=orange>Options => Mod Settings</color>
